sentences.sContent: The general goal was to close all "unverified defects" before a specific date.
sentences.sContent_eng: The general goal was to close all "unverified defects" before a specific date.
sentences.sCn: 主要的目标是在一个具体日期前消除所有“未经核对的缺陷”。

sentences.sContent: One potential hazard is the temptation to report unverified claims by scientists that would be rejected by a peer-reviewed journal.
sentences.sContent_eng: One potential hazard is the temptation to report unverified claims by scientists that would be rejected by a peer-reviewed journal.
sentences.sCn: 一个潜在危险是你会被诱惑报道科学家未经证实的主张，而这些主张可能会被同行评议的杂志拒绝。

synos.tran: 未经核对的，未经证实的

trans.tranCn: 未经证实的,  未经核对的
trans.tranOther: not having been confirmed, substantiated, or proven to be true
